title: Bolivia Nature Vol.2 Soundscapes
description: Pristine Ambisonic VR-Ready Bolivia Nature Soundscapes
longDescription:
This sound library is a collection of ambisonic recordings of various nature environments in Bolivia. All these ambiances have been recorded near the village of Samaipata. Some in a forest of giant ferns, some near rivers. These are pristine ambiances of wilderness with no trace of human beings.


Here is a link to the package preview :

https://soundcloud.com/user-60145229/bolivia-nature-vol2-soundscapes/s-MhVj43YgPxM
technicalDetails:
Features: (Please include a full, comprehensive list of the features of the product)

  •  Files come in B-Format AmbiX and Stereo
  •  Gear Used: Zoom F8 Recorder + Sennheiser Ambeo
  •  Size Unpacked: 7.30 GB

Number of Audio Waves: 38

Number of Audio Cues: 38

Sample rate / bit rate: (i.e. 22,050 or 44,100 Hz) 44,100 Hz

Do Sound FX loop: (Yes/No) Yes

Minutes of audio provided: 93min44sec

Supported Development Platforms:

Windows: (Yes/No) Yes

Mac: (Yes/No) Yes

Documentation: Link (or a description of where users can find) the documentation https://sonniss.com/sound-effects/bolivia-nature-vol-2/

Important/Additional Notes: With the free SoundField SurroundZone 2 plugin, you can easily convert B-format AmbiX files to the format you want (stereo, 5.0, 5.1, 6.0, 6.1, 7.0, 7.1)
